lore: When the Vengeful Djinn was born, this creature emerged from the cauldron in which the Nether Orb was boiling. Its very presence causes catastrophic events with serious consequences for anyone near the creature. However, the Cursed Slime itself is not evil, and it doesn't cause harm deliberately unless provoked. It decided to escape before the Djinn uprising and now wanders the world, involuntarily causing innumerable misfortunes in its path.
menagerieDialog: (It has an extremely punchable expression on its face.)
(This creature has such a goofy face that even your normally-stoic personality is no match for the temptation to knock it flat on its slimy ass.)
(For some reason, you find its undeterrable happiness to be quite obnoxious.)
(It's nibbiling at random bits of dust and debris off the floor. You should really find it some decent food to eat.)
name: Cursed Slime
